data.actual_result: You are moved to the top channel and no messages are there
data.expected_result: You should be moved to the top channel and see messages
data.short_description: When you delete a channel and are moved to the top channel in the list, if you haven't looked at the channel you're moved to since loading the app, no messages will be shown
data.steps_to_repro: - Look at a channel that isn't at the top of the channel list, in a server where you can delete channels - Double tap the home button and swipe up on Discord to close it - Open Discord and go to the server you were just in - Without opening the top channel, delete the channel you're looking at
